name: ORD_AUD_RECS
description: This table contains audited information about recommendations (follow-up, breast imaging, and screening programs).

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUD_RECOMMENDATION
columns.description: This column contains audited information about recommendations (follow-up, breast imaging, and screening programs). The source item is located at ORDER_RAD_REC_ID.FINDING_ID.
